items.title: CDSL – Valuation full but earnings growth can drive stock upside
items.description: CDSL has posted solid earnings in Q2FY25 and the stock valuation is full. However, MC Pro lists the reasons that can drive further stock upside.

items.title: Adani Green clarifies charges against executives following media reports
items.description: Adani Green has said statements claiming that Gautam Adani, Sagar Adani and Vneet Jaain have been charged with violating FCPA are incorrect

items.title: Activism in India’s Gig Economy: Balancing growth and workers' rights
items.description: India’s gig economy is growing and is responsible for creating jobs. It is facing challenges regarding workers' rights and conditions. Activism for gig workers should seek balanced solutions to protect them without disrupting trust in platforms, ensuring sustainable growth and economic stability

items.title: BPCL to commission its first green jet fuel production facility by 2027 in line with govt’s blending mandate
items.description: The company is yet to finalise the choice of locating the new facility at its existing refinery locations in Kochi or Mumbai
